formattedAddress: 30 E 60th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 30 E 60th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
At first I was skeptical about sending out my placenta and have it encapsulated by Pluscenta. After, tons of researching the different companies that do it and doulas that offer the service,  I was convinced that Pluscenta was my best choice. Not only was their process trusting and innovative, but their customer service was top notch. To me the Pluscenta pills have endless benefits. But the most remarkable one is the amount of milk I produce. Brownies? Cookies? Don’t waste your money on those and avoid gaining weight eating that junk… yes, those make you gain weight even if
You are lactating. My Pluscenta pills have been the best investment since I gave birth to my baby.

originalText.text:
I was a little skeptical at first. The communication was amazing with the company. They answered all my questions. Since they are based in NY they were able to come and pick up my Placenta from the hospital within 24 hours of my giving birth and that was amazing.
I am Breastfeeding and not sure if it had any impact on my supply but my milk did come in once I started taking them. My mood has also been great after birth. Would Highly recommend !!!!

text.text:

originalText.text: Plus+centa is great!  I was able to directly text them for all the questions I had, with almost immediate responses. I was able to schedule a pick up DIRECTLY from the hospital where we delivered (NYC), which was a huge relief off our shoulders. We delivered at 6:45pm but they were even willing to pick up the placenta at 12AM!!  The best part is we were discharged from the hospital two days after delivery and our package/capsules were already waiting for us at our door.  Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
I ended up giving birth before expected therefore I didn’t have the package ready but it was easy.
They informed me to just freeze it for best results, once package came in I sent it back and it was so easy! Excited to start taking these for my baby blues and hopefully increase my milk production!

originalText.text: Absolutely love this placenta encapsulation service! The pills have given me so much energy and I feel great! I highly recommend this company to anyone looking to transform their placenta into pills. A+ customer service and packaging.
